synopsis.text:
Description:
In a world where the enigmatic Power Stones hold the key to unparalleled power and wish fulfillment, Edward Falcon, an aspiring martial artist and son of a seasoned archaeologist, finds his life taking an unexpected turn. Upon receiving one of these legendary stones from his estranged father, Edward embarks on a thrilling journey to protect the remaining six stones from falling into the wrong hands.

As he traverses through uncharted lands, Edward encounters a myriad of formidable adversaries, including relentless ninjas and ruthless samurais, all vying to seize his newly acquired treasure. However, the Power Stone grants Edward a unique advantage, transforming him into a mighty combat robot in times of need, making him a force to be reckoned with.

As the world's most daring adventurers converge in search of the Power Stones, Edward must navigate the treacherous landscape, unlock the secrets of his newfound power, and ultimately, find his missing father. Based on the popular Dreamcast game, Power Stone, this anime promises a captivating tale of courage, destiny, and adventure.
